name: 2 Squared
description:
A nice and chill sokoban to play for lofi lovers and sokoban lovers. Made for the lost relic game jam. Move two blocks which move in opposind directions while trying to guide them towards the end of the level. Use obstacles to block the paths of blocks so that you can move out of sync.

Controls

Use the arrow keys or a gamepad d-pad to move the blocks around but be careful, when one block moves one way, the other block moves the other way!

Obstacles

You'll find some obstacles you'll have to navigate but some you might want to run into as they'll allow you to move the blocks out of sync with each other!

... and some blocks can only be pushed with a block of the same color

Bugs and Crashes

This game runs in a custom engine. If you come across any bugs and crashes, please leave a comment as it would be really helpful. We might reach out to get more info on the nature of the bug.

Credits

Samuel Mungy - Programming & Game Design

Anais Blenet - Game Design
